title: Region transfer. Potentially hacked?
body:
Heya, asking for a friend.

So she was logging in to league today and noticed a message stating: "Your account has transferred to another region. Please try logging in to the appropriate region."
She did not request this transfer and assumed it was because of a potential hacker? She changed her password but she can't login to the main website because it says invalid user password region combination. She just changed her password recently too so this whole situation is sketchy.

What can she do? She didn't want to be placed in a different region. She doesnt even know what region shes placed in currently.


EDIT: Yeah.. definitely hacked. The account was charged for a large amount.

replies.body:
The best thing your friend can do is change the password for the email that was associated with her account, then submit a support ticket using [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). If she provides *as much detail* about her account as possible, one of our recovery specialists will be able to assist her in recovering the account swiftly!

Let me know if you have any questions.
